original_title: Premiata Forneria Marconi - PFM in Classic da Mozart a Celebration
overview: Premiata Forneria Marconi performs live with a symphony orchestra on the Lugano Estival Jazz 2013.  Shown on the channel RSI 2 in HD.
tagline: Premiata Formeria Marconi live with symphony orchestra 2013
title: Premiata Forneria Marconi - PFM in Classic da Mozart a Celebration
